content: Apart from the exclusionary aspect of Pence’s “policies” about avoiding eating and drinking in the sole company of a woman, it seems to me this reveals a much bigger issue that I’m surprised you didn’t mention: whither self control? Apparently our Vice President either lacks the moral fortitude to resist whatever temptations he feels he might be exposed to by having a drink or a meal with a woman; or his wife doesn’t trust him and so he feels the need to avoid any situations which might give her cause to doubt him. Either way it’s a ludicrously sad commentary on someone who is supposed to be a leader, and a pious one at that.
